Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Spidergun = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
part = Instance.new("Part") part.Size = Vector3.new(4, 0.2, 4) part.Transparency = 1.0 part.CanCollide = false part.FormFactor = 3
web = Instance.new("Decal") web.Texture = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53592160" web.Face = 1 web.Parent = part
web1 = Instance.new("Decal") web1.Texture = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53592160" web1.Face = 4 web1.Parent = part
local spidergunSound
function bind(spider, hit) if hit.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") torso = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if humanoid and torso then humanoid:TakeDamage(15) local newScript = Tool:FindFirstChild("WebScript"):Clone() newScript.Disabled = false newScript.Parent = humanoid.Parent
bv = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bv.Name = "Rebound" bv.P = 100000 bv.maxForce = Vector3.new(100000, 0, 100000) bv.velocity = (torso.Position - spider.Position).unit * 30.0 bv.Parent = torso
spider.Parent = humanoid.Parent spider.Name = "Web"
weld = Instance.new("Weld") weld.Parent = humanoid.Parent weld.Part0 = torso weld.Part1 = spider weld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 0, 0))
else if spider then spider:Remove() end end end end
function shoot(pos, spider)
vCharacter = Tool.Parent
if vCharacter == nil or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then print("Player not found") return end
local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position spawnPos = spawnPos + pos.unit * 5.0
spider.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + pos) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0) spider.Velocity = pos * 75.0 spider.Name ="spider" spider.Parent = game.Workspace --spider.CanCollide = true
local spiderFloat = Instance.new("BodyForce") spiderFloat.force = Vector3.new(0.0, spider:GetMass() * 196.1, 0.0) spiderFloat.Parent = spider
local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = vPlayer creatorTag.Parent = spider
spider.Touched:connect(function (hit) bind(spider, hit) end)
debris:addItem(spider, 5)
end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myTorso == nil then print("Torso not found") return end
spidergunSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("SpiderGunSound") if spidergunSound then spidergunSound:Play() end
local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (target - vCharacter.Head.Position).unit
local spider = part:Clone() shoot(lookAt, spider) wait(2.5) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() if SpidergunSound then SpidergunSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local vChar = script.Parent local torso = vChar:FindFirstChild("Torso") local humanoid = vChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
local bv = torso:FindFirstChild("Rebound")
local spider = vChar:FindFirstChild("spider")
local count = 1
function pin(hit) if hit.Parent and hit.className == "Part" and hit.Name ~= "spider" then if count == 1 then if bv then bv:Remove() end count = count + 1 torso.Anchored = true humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 wait(2.0) torso.Anchored = false humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end end end
local pinConnection = torso.Touched:connect(pin)
wait(0.75) bv = torso:FindFirstChild("Rebound") if bv then bv:Remove() end wait(2.5) if spider then spider:Remove() end wait(0.5) if pinConnection then pinConnection:disconnect() end
wait(1.0) script:Remove()
